hero.title: is an online store for sale chocolate and confectionary handmade products.

description.paragraf-1: We all have things in life that we like to do. We call it a simple word - “hobby”. But a very small percentage of people on our planet are able to turn their hobby into their main activity, in other words, turn their hobby into their job.
description.paragraf-2: I am sure that when a person does something that gives him pleasure and joy, the world around us becomes a little better. And I would really like for as many people as possible to be able to see and try the result of this work, and also smile!
description.paragraf-3: My beloved wife has been making handmade chocolate products and edible bouquets for several years, and her works are very much liked not only by me personally, but also by many other people. And I had the idea to make the results of her work available to a wide audience. I hope everything will work out for us!!!

handMade.title: Hand made
handMade.description: All sweets are made by hand. Each piece of chocolate is created with love and attention to detail, which adds a special value to the product.

quality.title: High quality ingredients
quality.description: For the production of sweets, high-quality natural ingredients are used without the addition of preservatives, artificial flavors and dyes.

delivery.title: Fast delivery
delivery.description: Sweets are sent within three days from the moment the order is placed. Orders are delivered by Nova Poshta.
